Biden did not mention Dr: Seuss by name in his 2021 proclamation recognizing Read Across America Day, which differed from some of his predecessors who specifically mentioned Dr. Seuss.
Efforts to move away from tying Dr: Seuss to Read Across America Day had already begun before Biden took office.
Claims that a public school district in: canceled" Dr. Seuss books were proven to be false.
The National Education Association: NEA) had been pushing for Read Across America Day to focus more on diverse children's book authors and address racist depictions in some of Dr. Seuss' works.
